short_summary: The Department of National Defence is requesting proposals for spare parts of the sea water system.
description: The department is seeking to procure the items detailed
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

**Tender Number:** W8482-253114/A
**Reference Number:** 62086026

## Notice Details
The Department of National Defence intends to obtain spare parts for the Sea Water System. The requisition includes delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia, and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

## Items for Requisition
The following items are to be procured:

1. DIAPHRAGM, VALVE, FLAT - 9 units, Part No.: 000005-069-B76A, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
2. DIAPHRAGM, VALVE, FLAT - 13 units, Part No.: 000005-069-B76A, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
3. PACKING, PREFORMED - 24 units, Part No.: 005675-651-779, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
4. PACKING, PREFORMED - 24 units, Part No.: 005675-651-779, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
5. DIAPHRAGM, ACTUATOR VALVE, SPECIAL SHAPED - 15 units, Part No.: 010274-040-779, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
6. DIAPHRAGM, ACTUATOR VALVE, SPECIAL SHAPED - 5 units, Part No.: 010274-040-779, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
7. DIAPHRAGM, ACTUATOR VALVE, SPECIAL SHAPED - 10 units, Part No.: 700804-027-779, NCAGE: 81576, DRESSER CANADA INC, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
